dcterms:creator: Ming Zhou

dcterms:description: The SMARTS environment creates several scenarios for multi-agent reinforcement learning in autonomous driving, focusing on cooperative learning among agents.

dcterms:creator: John Schulman
Sergey Levine
Kevin Murphy
Michael Jordan
dcterms:description: Trust Region Policy Optimization is a reinforcement learning algorithm that optimizes policies by ensuring updates stay within a trust region.
dcterms:title: Trust Region Policy Optimization

dcterms:creator: Thanard Kurutach
John Schulman
Sergey Levine
dcterms:description: Model-ensemble Trust-Region Policy Optimization enhances the standard TRPO by using an ensemble of models to improve policy learning.
dcterms:title: Model-ensemble Trust-Region Policy Optimization

Filip Wolski
Prafulla Dhariwal
Alec Radford
Oleg Klimov
dcterms:description: Proximal Policy Optimization algorithms are a family of reinforcement learning algorithms that optimize policies using a surrogate objective function.
dcterms:title: Proximal Policy Optimization Algorithms

dcterms:creator: Gang Chen
Yiming Peng
Mengjie Zhang
dcterms:description: An adaptive clipping approach for Proximal Policy Optimization that improves the stability and performance of the algorithm.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Clipping Approach for Proximal Policy Optimization

dcterms:creator: Ahmed Alagha
Yiming Peng
Mengjie Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on target localization using multi-agent deep learning with Proximal Policy Optimization.
dcterms:title: Target Localization Using Multi-Agent Deep Learning with Proximal Policy Optimization

dcterms:creator: Oliver Lohse
Noah Pütz
Korbinian Hörmann
dcterms:description: An online scheduling approach for production using Multi-Agent Proximal Policy Optimization.
dcterms:title: Online Scheduling Approach for Production with Multi-Agent Proximal Policy Optimization

dcterms:creator: Ross E. Allen
Yiming Peng
Mengjie Zhang
dcterms:description: Health-informed policy gradients for multi-agent reinforcement learning that incorporate health metrics into the learning process.
dcterms:title: Health-Informed Policy Gradients for Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on continuous control tasks using deep reinforcement learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Continuous Control with Deep Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: Yuenan Hou

dcterms:description: This dataset improves DDPG via prioritized experience replay, enhancing the learning efficiency of the algorithm.
dcterms:title: Improving DDPG via Prioritized Experience Replay

dcterms:creator: Xiaolong Wei
Yiming Peng
Mengjie Zhang
dcterms:description: Recurrent MADDPG for object detection and assignment in combat tasks, focusing on multi-agent scenarios.

dcterms:description: R-MADDPG for partially observable environments and limited communication, enhancing multi-agent learning in constrained settings.

Yiming Peng
Mengjie Zhang
dcterms:description: ME-MADDPG is an efficient learning-based motion planning method for multiple agents in complex environments.
dcterms:title: ME-MADDPG: An Efficient Learning-Based Motion Planning Method for Multiple Agents in Complex Environments
